title: Bloomberg Markets: Free ESPN in Dorms Good for Comcast
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Free ESPN in Dorms Good for Comcast
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Gerry Smith Media Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing how free ESPN in dorm rooms will give Comcast access to future customers. More than 100 schools sign up for cable giant’s online service.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
